name: Bartlesville Capoeira
notes: Bartlesville, Oklahoma. The only other capoeirista heard of is a girl in Bartlesville who did angola in chicago, moved here, then the older sister went to Brazil. We are unable to find any other information 6/20/19. SOURCE: email 7/24/03
rawRecord:
"The only other capoeirista I've heard of is a girl in Bartlesvile,
OK.  She and her sister did angola in chicago...moved here...then
the older sister went to Brazil and had been living several months. 
I invited them down, but never heard back so they may have moved back to
chicago."
SOURCE email  7/24/03

(We are unable to find any other information 6/20/19)

name: Ponca City Capoeira
notes: Ponca City, Oklahoma. Robert C Black did angola and regional for about 7 years. He teaches at a church, and mainly trains a young peoples group. He was going into the military. His younger brother was to keep the class going if he could. There is a Robert Casey Black who formerly lived in Ponca City. He is in California now. We are unable to find any other information 6/23/19. SOURCE: email 7/23/03
rawRecord:
"Robert C Black did angola and regional for about 7 years He teaches
at a church, and mainly trains a young peoples group.He was going into
the military so may be there now. His younger brother was to keep the class
going if he could."
SOURCE email 7/23/03 

 (There  is a Robert Casey Black who formerly lived in Ponca City. He 
is in California now  We are unable to find any other information 6/23/19)
